Reviews.Title: No tripod
Reviews.Author: EMILIANO CRESPO
Reviews.Content: In the title of the product ofers and tripod, that does not come. The camera is perfect for the price

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: FERDINAND CRUZ
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, so easy to use & all the pictures that I 've been taken is automatically downloaded to my phone. I recommend this to all camera to all my friends.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F Dual-View Smart Digital Camera (Black) Premium Bundle With `6GB card , Digpro Case , Cleaning Kit And Tripod
